name: 2.zaixianai.cn
url:
<js>
let url='https://www.zaixianai.cn/voiceCompose';

let ua="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.198 Safari/537.36";

let doc=java.get(url,{"User-Agent":ua});
let cookie=String(doc.header("set-cookie")).match(/laravel_session=[^\n]+/)[0];
let token=String(doc.body()).match(/token="([^"]+)/)[1];

url='https://www.zaixianai.cn/Api_getVoice,'+JSON.stringify({
"method": "POST",
"body": "content=" + java.encodeURI(speakText) + "&volume=50&speech_rate=0&voice=Aixia&_token="+token,
"headers": {
"User-Agent": ua,
"cookie": cookie
}
});

let res=java.ajax(url);

'https://www.zaixianai.cn/voice/'+JSON.parse(res).data.file_name+','+JSON.stringify({
"headers": {
"User-Agent": ua,
"accept": "*/*",
"referer": "https://www.zaixianai.cn/voiceCompose",
"cookie": cookie,
"accept-encoding": "identity;q=1, *;q=0"
}
})
</js>
